meanings.definition: Following the delivery of a baby.
meanings.sent1: The postdelivery checkup ensured the new mother and baby were healthy.
meanings.sent2: The postdelivery care provided by the hospital was exceptional.
meanings.sent3: After the postdelivery celebration, the family was overjoyed with their new addition.
meanings.sent4: The postdelivery period was a time of great joy and adjustment for the parents.
meanings.sent5: The postdelivery room was filled with love and happiness.

meanings.definition: The period of time after a package or letter has been delivered.
meanings.sent1: The postdelivery of the parcel was confirmed by the recipient.
meanings.sent2: The postdelivery process includes tracking and confirmation of receipt.
meanings.sent3: The postdelivery excitement of receiving a package can be quite thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The postdelivery of the letter brought relief to the sender.
meanings.sent5: The postdelivery notification informed the customer that their package had arrived.
